Squizzy::
She was loking up at Zardus when the edges of her vision became 
fuzzy.  She tried to speak, but the words didn't come out.  She went 
into stasis lock. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus/Reptilica::
> 
> The corners of Zardus' mouth slowly twist into a smile as Squizzy 
wakes up, 
> the Alliance commander attatching a few more wires to her head.
> 
> "You will know in a few seconds," he says, attatching her main 
proccessor to 
> another console to get some info out of it. At least her name. He 
presses a 
> few buttons on the console that Squizzy is hoocked up to, and the 
computer 
> attempts to put her into stasis.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Nodding nervioustly, Reptilica pushes a few buttons on the 
controlls, the 
> shuttle lifting off and heading for the Alliance base. He couldn't 
wait to 
> see how Zardus would punish these three for how they've treated him.
